meanings.definition: To groom oneself with excessive pride or vanity.
meanings.sent1: The peacock outpreens its feathers before strutting around.
meanings.sent2: She always outpreens herself before going out, spending hours in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent3: The cat outpreens itself, thinking it is the most elegant creature in the house.
meanings.sent4: The model outpreens her competitors with her flawless appearance on the runway.
meanings.sent5: He outpreens like a peacock, showing off his new haircut to everyone.

meanings.definition: To display excessive pride or vanity in one's appearance.
meanings.sent1: The rich lady outpreens in her designer clothes, looking down on others.
meanings.sent2: He outpreens whenever he receives a compliment, basking in the attention.
meanings.sent3: The actor outpreens on the red carpet, posing for the cameras with exaggerated confidence.
meanings.sent4: The politician outpreens during interviews, always making sure his appearance is perfect.
meanings.sent5: She outpreens like a queen, expecting everyone to admire her beauty.
